attributes.action: Make parking in parent and child spaces without a child punishable via a fine
attributes.additional_details: Help us made it an offence to park in these spaces without children
attributes.background: Parent and child spaces are purposely made wide for ease of getting the kids out of the car, it's very frustrating when people park in these spaces with either no children or grown up children who don't need to use these spaces leaving no spaces for those who actually need them
